item.title: How Lufthansa has made me question the value of Star Alliance
item.description: This is one of those posts you write on your phone while getting sprayed for 11+ hours with bathroom chemicals in minimally reclining seat in a second to last row of a transatlantic flight. Still, Iâ€™m going to try to be as constructive as my thumbs allow.
